<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rejuvenation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3502) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 47</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=177)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3496)

</column>

---

The call of your unfinished business recreates you after destruction. When you're destroyed, you reform after 2d4 days within your bound site, fully healed. If your unfinished business is resolved while you're waiting, you pass on immediately unless you and the GM determine you have new unfinished business.
name: Rejuvenation
